title: New: Frank Ocean – Sweet LIFE
body:
As if we needed anymore reason to love **Frank Ocean** aside from his devastatingly brilliant music; the heartwrenching honesty displayed in a note earlier this week in which he spoke of his bisexuality and difficulties in coming to terms with the neglectful society in which we live made him all the more endearing.

New track _Sweet LIFE_ is a gloriously 60’s inspired jam, like something that **Little Richard** might have written had he been about in the 21st century. Racking up an impressive 100,000 plays in under two hours, 2011 is the year that **Frank Ocean** cascades into the mainstream.
